name: [II](oo)
description:
Throw enemies to make others explode, but be careful not to get caught in the explosion!

Controls:

  • Arrows or WASD: move
  • X or J: punch
  • C or K: grab defeated enemies

Collecting consecutive stars without missing one will grant you more score. Miss a star and the score bonus will reset.

Created By:

  • Frogrammer - Programming
  • sarn - Art, some additional programming

Originally made in 8 hours for a personal game jam, this version has been slightly polished. The original 8 hours version is available for download below.
